minecraft:adventure/arbalistic.name: Arbalistic
minecraft:adventure/arbalistic.description: Kill five unique mobs with one crossbow shot

minecraft:adventure/avoid_vibration.name: Sneak 100
minecraft:adventure/avoid_vibration.description: Sneak within 8 blocks from a sculk sensor, or 16 blocks from a warden.

minecraft:adventure/blowback.name: Blowback
minecraft:adventure/blowback.description: Kill a Breeze with a deflected Breeze-shot Wind Charge

minecraft:adventure/brush_armadillo.name: Isn't It Scute?
minecraft:adventure/brush_armadillo.description: Get Armadillo Scutes from an Armadillo using a Brush

minecraft:adventure/bullseye.name: Bullseye
minecraft:adventure/bullseye.description: Hit the bullseye of a Target block from at least 30 meters away

minecraft:adventure/craft_decorated_pot_.name: Careful Restoration
minecraft:adventure/craft_decorated_pot_.description: Make a Decorated Pot out of 4 Pottery Sherds

minecraft:adventure/crafters_crafting_cr.name: Crafters Crafting Crafters
minecraft:adventure/crafters_crafting_cr.description: Be near a Crafter when it crafts a Crafter

minecraft:adventure/fall_from_world_heig.name: Caves & Cliffs
minecraft:adventure/fall_from_world_heig.description: Free fall from the top of the world (build limit) to the bottom of the world and survive

minecraft:adventure/heart_transplanter.name: Heart Transplanter
minecraft:adventure/heart_transplanter.description: Place a Creaking Heart with the correct alignment between two Pale Oak Log blocks

minecraft:adventure/hero_of_the_village.name: Hero of the Village
minecraft:adventure/hero_of_the_village.description: Successfully defend a village from a raid

minecraft:adventure/honey_block_slide.name: Sticky Situation
minecraft:adventure/honey_block_slide.description: Collide on a vertical side of a honey block while falling.

minecraft:adventure/kill_mob_near_sculk_.name: It Spreads
minecraft:adventure/kill_mob_near_sculk_.description: Kill a mob near a Sculk Catalyst

minecraft:adventure/lighten_up.name: Lighten Up
minecraft:adventure/lighten_up.description: Use an axe on a lit copper bulb that is at least partially oxidized.

minecraft:adventure/lightning_rod_with_v.name: Surge Protector
minecraft:adventure/lightning_rod_with_v.description: Be near a lightning bolt that didn't cause fire and has an unharmed villager nearby.

minecraft:adventure/overoverkill.name: Over-Overkill
minecraft:adventure/overoverkill.description: Deal 50 hearts of damage in a single hit using the Mace

minecraft:adventure/play_jukebox_in_mead.name: Sound of Music
minecraft:adventure/play_jukebox_in_mead.description: Use a music disc on a jukebox that is in the meadow biome.

minecraft:adventure/read_power_of_chisel.name: The Power of Books
minecraft:adventure/read_power_of_chisel.description: Read the power signal of a Chiseled Bookshelf using a Comparator

minecraft:adventure/revaulting.name: Revaulting
minecraft:adventure/revaulting.description: Use an Ominous Trial Key on an Ominous Vault

minecraft:adventure/root.name: Adventure
minecraft:adventure/root.description: Kill or get killed by an entity

minecraft:adventure/salvage_sherd.name: Respecting the Remnants
minecraft:adventure/salvage_sherd.description: Brush a Suspicious block to obtain a Pottery Sherd

minecraft:adventure/sniper_duel.name: Sniper Duel
minecraft:adventure/sniper_duel.description: Kill a Skeleton from at least 50 meters away

minecraft:adventure/spyglass_at_dragon.name: Is It a Plane?
minecraft:adventure/spyglass_at_dragon.description: Look at the Ender Dragon through a Spyglass

minecraft:adventure/spyglass_at_ghast.name: Is It a Balloon?
minecraft:adventure/spyglass_at_ghast.description: Look at a Ghast through a Spyglass

minecraft:adventure/spyglass_at_parrot.name: Is It a Bird?
minecraft:adventure/spyglass_at_parrot.description: Look at a Parrot through a Spyglass

minecraft:adventure/throw_trident.name: A Throwaway Joke
minecraft:adventure/throw_trident.description: Hit a mob with a thrown trident.

minecraft:adventure/totem_of_undying.name: Postmortal
minecraft:adventure/totem_of_undying.description: Use a Totem of Undying to cheat death

minecraft:adventure/trade_at_world_heigh.name: Star Trader
minecraft:adventure/trade_at_world_heigh.description: Trade with a Villager at the build height limit

minecraft:adventure/trim_with_any_armor_.name: Crafting a New Look
minecraft:adventure/trim_with_any_armor_.description: Craft a trimmed armor at a Smithing Table

minecraft:adventure/two_birds_one_arrow.name: Two Birds, One Arrow

minecraft:adventure/under_lock_and_key.name: Under Lock and Key
minecraft:adventure/under_lock_and_key.description: Use a Trial Key on a Vault

minecraft:adventure/use_lodestone.name: Country Lode, Take Me Home
minecraft:adventure/use_lodestone.description: Use a compass on a lodestone.

minecraft:adventure/very_very_frightenin.name: Very Very Frightening
minecraft:adventure/very_very_frightenin.description: Strike a villager with lightning using a trident.

minecraft:adventure/walk_on_powder_snow_.name: Light as a Rabbit
minecraft:adventure/walk_on_powder_snow_.description: Walk on powder snow while wearing leather boots.

minecraft:adventure/who_needs_rockets.name: Who Needs Rockets?
minecraft:adventure/who_needs_rockets.description: Use a Wind Charge to launch yourself upwards 8 blocks

minecraft:adventure/whos_the_pillager_no.name: Who's the Pillager Now?
minecraft:adventure/whos_the_pillager_no.description: Kill a pillager with a crossbow shot.

minecraft:end/dragon_breath.name: You Need a Mint
minecraft:end/dragon_breath.description: Collect Dragon's Breath in a Glass Bottle

minecraft:end/find_end_city.name: The City at the End of the Game

minecraft:end/levitate.name: Great View From Up Here
minecraft:end/levitate.description: Levitate up 50 blocks from the attacks of a Shulker

minecraft:husbandry/allay_deliver_cake_t.name: Birthday Song
minecraft:husbandry/allay_deliver_cake_t.description: Have an Allay drop a Cake at a Note Block

minecraft:husbandry/allay_deliver_item_t.name: You've Got a Friend in Me
minecraft:husbandry/allay_deliver_item_t.description: Have an allay deliver items to you.

minecraft:husbandry/axolotl_in_a_bucket.name: The Cutest Predator
minecraft:husbandry/axolotl_in_a_bucket.description: Catch an Axolotl in a Bucket

minecraft:husbandry/froglights.name: With Our Powers Combined!
minecraft:husbandry/froglights.description: Have a Pearlescent, Ochre, and Verdant Froglight in your inventory.

minecraft:husbandry/kill_axolotl_target.name: The Healing Power of Friendship!
minecraft:husbandry/kill_axolotl_target.description: Team up with an axolotl and win a fight

minecraft:husbandry/leash_all_frog_varia.name: When the Squad Hops into Town
minecraft:husbandry/leash_all_frog_varia.description: Leash all frog variants (can be done at separate times)

minecraft:husbandry/make_a_sign_glow.name: Glow and Behold!
minecraft:husbandry/make_a_sign_glow.description: Make the text of a sign glow using glow ink sac.

minecraft:husbandry/obtain_netherite_hoe.name: Serious Dedication
minecraft:husbandry/obtain_netherite_hoe.description: Have a netherite hoe in the inventory.

minecraft:husbandry/place_dried_ghast_in.name: Stay Hydrated!
minecraft:husbandry/place_dried_ghast_in.description: Place a dried ghast in water.

minecraft:husbandry/remove_wolf_armor.name: Shear Brilliance
minecraft:husbandry/remove_wolf_armor.description: Remove Wolf Armor from a Wolf using Shears

minecraft:husbandry/repair_wolf_armor.name: Good as New
minecraft:husbandry/repair_wolf_armor.description: Repair damaged wolf armor to full while it's equipped on the wolf.

minecraft:husbandry/ride_a_boat_with_a_g.name: Whatever Floats Your Goat!
minecraft:husbandry/ride_a_boat_with_a_g.description: Ride a boat with a goat.

minecraft:husbandry/root.name: Husbandry
minecraft:husbandry/root.description: Consume anything that can be consumed, except for cake.

minecraft:husbandry/safely_harvest_honey.name: Bee Our Guest
minecraft:husbandry/safely_harvest_honey.description: Use a glass bottle on a beehive or bee nest while not angering the bees inside (place a campfire under the bee nest or bee hive).

minecraft:husbandry/silk_touch_nest.name: Total Beelocation
minecraft:husbandry/silk_touch_nest.description: Break a bee nest with 3 bees using silk touch

minecraft:husbandry/tactical_fishing.name: Tactical Fishing
minecraft:husbandry/tactical_fishing.description: Use a water bucket on a fish

minecraft:husbandry/tadpole_in_a_bucket.name: Bukkit Bukkit
minecraft:husbandry/tadpole_in_a_bucket.description: Catch a tadpole with a bucket

minecraft:husbandry/wax_off.name: Wax Off
minecraft:husbandry/wax_off.description: Use an axe on a waxed Copper block

minecraft:husbandry/wax_on.name: Wax On
minecraft:husbandry/wax_on.description: Apply Honeycomb to a Copper block!

minecraft:nether/all_effects.name: How Did We Get Here?
minecraft:nether/all_effects.description: Have every effect applied at the same time

minecraft:nether/all_potions.name: A Furious Cocktail
minecraft:nether/all_potions.description: Have every potion effect applied at the same time.

minecraft:nether/charge_respawn_anchor.name: Not Quite "Nine" Lives
minecraft:nether/charge_respawn_anchor.description: Charge a Respawn Anchor to the maximum

minecraft:nether/create_beacon.name: Bring Home the Beacon
minecraft:nether/create_beacon.description: Place a Beacon and stand near it when it powers.

minecraft:nether/create_full_beacon.name: Beaconator
minecraft:nether/create_full_beacon.description: Bring a Beacon to full power

minecraft:nether/distract_piglin.name: Oh Shiny
minecraft:nether/distract_piglin.description: Distract a piglin with gold while it is aggravated

minecraft:nether/fast_travel.name: Subspace Bubble
minecraft:nether/fast_travel.description: Use the Nether to travel 7 km in the Overworld

minecraft:nether/loot_bastion.name: War Pigs
minecraft:nether/loot_bastion.description: Loot a Chest in a Bastion Remnant

minecraft:nether/netherite_armor.name: Cover Me in Debris
minecraft:nether/netherite_armor.description: Get a full suit of Netherite armor

minecraft:nether/return_to_sender.name: Return to Sender
minecraft:nether/return_to_sender.description: Kill a ghast by deflecting a ghast fireball back into it.

minecraft:nether/ride_strider.name: This Boat Has Legs
minecraft:nether/ride_strider.description: Use a warped fungus on a stick (interact, not just hold) while riding on a strider

minecraft:nether/ride_strider_in_overwor.name: Feels Like Home
minecraft:nether/ride_strider_in_overwor.description: While riding a strider, travel 50 blocks on lava in the Overworld. (Only horizontal displacement is counted, going in circles doesn't work)

minecraft:nether/uneasy_alliance.name: Uneasy Alliance
minecraft:nether/uneasy_alliance.description: Kill a Ghast while being in the Overworld.

minecraft:story/cure_zombie_villager.name: Zombie Doctor
minecraft:story/cure_zombie_villager.description: Use a golden apple on a zombie villager under the Weakness effect and wait for the villager to recover.

minecraft:story/deflect_arrow.name: Not Today, Thank You
minecraft:story/deflect_arrow.description: Deflect a projectile with a Shield

minecraft:story/enchant_item.name: Enchanter
minecraft:story/enchant_item.description: Enchant an item at an Enchanting Table

minecraft:story/lava_bucket.name: Hot Stuff
minecraft:story/lava_bucket.description: Have a lava bucket in your inventory.

minecraft:story/obtain_armor.name: Suit Up
minecraft:story/obtain_armor.description: Have any type of iron armor in the inventory.

minecraft:story/root.name: Minecraft
minecraft:story/root.description: Have a crafting table in the inventory.

minecraft:story/shiny_gear.name: Cover Me with Diamonds
minecraft:story/shiny_gear.description: Have any type of diamond armor in the inventory.
